Desc.eng: Well, well! A good day to you, stranger. And to you, my lady.
Easy, Katarina. We don't need new enemies right now. We have plenty already.
So what? You should've kept your mouth shut! Now you'll die. Boys!
Oh, great! What have we here?
A good day to you, too. Do you have a free spot for two tired travelers?
Travelers, huh? What kind of traveler takes a ghost lady with him?
Your average, noble and rich Borgovian traveler, I suppose.
And you should know that I'm a monster hunter.
That's good to hear. The thing is, good sir, that we are outlaws, and now we will rob you blind.
Ah, you must be the famous Van Helsing then! My apologies for the misunderstanding. Why don't we all put away our weapons and let you to browse our goods?
Weapons, silk, jewelryâ€¦ Tell me, Van Helsing, does this sound familiar?
Yes, it does. You are all filthy outlaws, just like you said.
